languages.text: "Когда благословение смерти настигло Домин'Теодору, нас не было рядом. Потеря владычицы покрыла позором Кровавую паутину. Прежде чем предстать перед тобой, мы были обязаны вернуть свою честь. Выследить предателей. Разрезать их от глотки до паха и омыть кровью еретиков переборки флагмана в священном ритуале очищения".

"We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."
languages.original_text: "Когда благословение смерти настигло Домин'Теодору, нас не было рядом. Потеря владычицы покрыла позором Кровавую паутину. Прежде чем предстать перед тобой, мы были обязаны вернуть свою честь. Выследить предателей. Разрезать их от глотки до паха и омыть кровью еретиков переборки флагмана в священном ритуале очищения".

traits.locale_text: "When the blessing of death reached Enim'Theodora, we were not by her side. The loss of our lady covered the Bloodspun Web in shame. We could not reveal ourselves to you unless and until we restored our honour. Tracked down the traitors. Cut them open from throat to groin and washed the flagship's bulkheads in the blood of heretics as a sacred rite of cleansing."

"When the blessing of death reached Enim'Theodora, we were not by her side. The loss of our lady covered the Bloodspun Web in shame. We could not reveal ourselves to you unless and until we restored our honour. Tracked down the traitors. Cut them open from throat to groin and washed the flagship's bulkheads in the blood of heretics as a sacred rite of cleansing."

"We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Enim'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

"We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Enim'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

"We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

"We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

languages.text: « Nous n'étions pas là lorsque Domin'Théodora s'est vue accorder la bénédiction de la mort, un échec cuisant qui a jeté l'opprobre sur la Toile de Sang. Nous ne pouvions pas nous présenter devant vous avant d'avoir rétabli notre honneur. Nous avons traqué les traîtres et ouvert leurs corps en deux avant de laver les cloisons du vaisseau amiral dans leur sang lors d'un rituel sacré de purification. »
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'étions pas là lorsque Domin'Théodora s'est vue accorder la bénédiction de la mort, un échec cuisant qui a jeté l'opprobre sur la Toile de Sang. Nous ne pouvions pas nous présenter devant vous avant d'avoir rétabli notre honneur. Nous avons traqué les traîtres et ouvert leurs corps en deux avant de laver les cloisons du vaisseau amiral dans leur sang lors d'un rituel sacré de purification. »

languages.text: «No estuvimos presentes cuando Domin'Theodora obtuvo la bendición de la muerte. Nuestro fracaso supuso la vergüenza para la Red Sanguinolenta. No podíamos mostrarnos ante usted hasta haber restaurado nuestro honor. Rastreamos a los traidores y abrimos sus cuerpos. Después, lavamos las mamparas de la nave insignia con su sangre en un ritual de purificación sagrado».
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

traits.locale_text: «No estuvimos presentes cuando Domin'Theodora obtuvo la bendición de la muerte. Nuestro fracaso supuso la vergüenza para la Red Sanguinolenta. No podíamos mostrarnos ante usted hasta haber restaurado nuestro honor. Rastreamos a los traidores y abrimos sus cuerpos. Después, lavamos las mamparas de la nave insignia con su sangre en un ritual de purificación sagrado».

languages.text: “因为秘者西奥多拉得到死亡的祝福时，我们并不在场。我们的失败令织血罗网蒙辱。我们只有恢复了名誉，才能出现在你面前。我们找到了那些叛徒，切开了他们的肉体，用他们的鲜血清洗这艘船的舱壁。这是神圣的净化仪式。”
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

traits.locale_text: “因为秘者西奥多拉得到死亡的祝福时，我们并不在场。我们的失败令织血罗网蒙辱。我们只有恢复了名誉，才能出现在你面前。我们找到了那些叛徒，切开了他们的肉体，用他们的鲜血清洗这艘船的舱壁。这是神圣的净化仪式。”

languages.text: 「ドミン・セオドラに死の祝福が与えられた際、私たちはその場にいませんでした。我々の失敗はブラッドスパン・ウェブに恥をもたらしました。名誉を回復するまで、あなたの前に姿を現すことは出来なかったのです。我々は裏切り者を探し出し、その体を切り裂いた。そして、彼らの血で旗艦の隔壁を洗い、神聖な儀式の浄化を行いました」
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・セオドラに死の祝福が与えられた際、私たちはその場にいませんでした。我々の失敗はブラッドスパン・ウェブに恥をもたらしました。名誉を回復するまで、あなたの前に姿を現すことは出来なかったのです。我々は裏切り者を探し出し、その体を切り裂いた。そして、彼らの血で旗艦の隔壁を洗い、神聖な儀式の浄化を行いました」

languages.text: "Wir waren nicht dabei, als Domin'Theodora der Segen des Todes geschenkt wurde. Unser Versagen hat Schande über das Blutgesponnene Netz gebracht. Wir konnten Euch nicht gegenübertreten, bevor wir unsere Ehre wiederhergestellt hatten. Wir haben die Verräter aufgespürt und ihre Körper aufgeschlitzt. Dann haben wir die Schotte des Flaggschiffs mit ihrem Blut gewaschen, ein heiliges Ritual der Läuterung."
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."

languages.text: "Ölüm lütfu Domin'Theodora'ya bahşedildiğinde yanında değildik. Başarısızlığımız, Kanipi Ağı'nın yüz karasıdır. Şerefimize kavuşana dek karşına çıkamazdık. Hainlerin izini sürüp bedenlerini yardık. Ardından da sancak gemisinin bölme panellerini kanlarına bulayıp kutsal arınma ayinini gerçekleştirdik."
languages.original_text: "We were not there when the blessing of death was granted to Domin'Theodora. Our failure brought shame upon the Bloodspun Web. We could not stand before you until we restored our honour. We tracked down the traitors and sliced open their bodies. Then we washed the flagship's bulkheads in their blood in a sacred act of ritual purification."
